content:
TITLE: Sample Pew Manufacturers List

Appendix B: Sample Pew Manufacturers List
This appendix provides a preliminary list of ten reputable pew manufacturers based on
industry knowledge and public trade references. The list is intended to serve as a starting
point for vendor engagement and quote requests. Further verification of contact details and
current operations should be conducted, potentially by Clough or another team member, to
ensure accuracy before outreach.
Manufacturer Location Notes
Holland Pew Works Grand Rapids, MI Longstanding custom pew
maker with national reach.

Heritage Pew & Church
Furniture

St. Louis, MO Known for traditional and
durable designs.

Peck Manufacturing Church
Furniture

AL/GA region Regional supplier with
potential SIP integration
opportunities.

Church Furniture, Inc. Dallas, TX Large national distributor
with competitive pricing.

Heartland Church
Furnishings

Nebraska Offers modern pew designs
and resilient materials.
Thomas Overhead Pew Co. South Carolina Southern regional specialist

with strong local
reputation.

Church Pew Woodworks Philadelphia, PA Specializes in custom work
and historic pew
restorations.

Chapel Interiors California West Coast manufacturer
with modern pew systems.
Midwest Church Interiors Illinois Midwestern manufacturer
with grant-ready project
portfolios.
New Life Pew & Furniture Florida Southeast regional
manufacturer ideal for pilot
projects.
